Interface ItemRecipeScoreRepository

  • Method Details

    • existsItemRecipeScoreByItem_ItemIdAndRecipe_RecipeId

      boolean existsItemRecipeScoreByItem_ItemIdAndRecipe_RecipeId(Long itemId, Long recipeId)
      This method determines whether a given ItemRecipeScore is made, by checking the item id and recipe id.
      Parameters:
      itemId - ID of item to be checked, given as a Long object.
      recipeId - ID of recipe to be checked, given as a Long object.
      Returns:
      Status whether the item recipe score exists or not.

    • findItemRecipeScoreByItem_ItemIdAndRecipe_RecipeId

      Optional<ItemRecipeScore> findItemRecipeScoreByItem_ItemIdAndRecipe_RecipeId(Long itemId, Long recipeId)
      This method retrieves the ItemRecipeScore based on the item id and recipe id provided.
      Parameters:
      itemId - ID of the item, given as a Long.
      recipeId - ID of the recipe, given as a Long.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the item recipe score entity.

    • findByItem_ItemId

      Optional<List<ItemRecipeScore>> findByItem_ItemId(Long itemId)
      This method retrieves a list of Item Recipe Score entities for a given item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - ID of the item, given as a Long.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the list of ItemRecipeScores.
